title: Locked
description: ~Reece~ Have you ever met someone and had the feeling that you’ve known them before? Have you ever felt an inexplicable familiarity when you look into that person’s eyes? I have. Every time I look at Caydon, I feel this way. I wish he would feel the same way about me. ~Caydon~ Reece gets under my skin. She is the most irritating creature in the world. And she barely speaks. Although she irritates me, I'm addicted to her. I lose my mind when I'm around her. Maybe, I see her fear and it resembles mine. It's like I've seen it before...another place...another time. That's crazy, right?Mature Content Advisory-Sexual Content, Explicit Language
author: Ella Col
